settings.label: ISO language code support RTL
settings.info: Leave blank if you want to apply to all languages. Separate your ISO codes if you want apply to some one languages ar; fa; ku; pa; sd

settings.content: Cart and checkout prices always show currency codes. Example: $1.00 USD.

settings.label: Custom width
settings.info: Only active when enable custom width

settings.content: The Fluid container provides a larger width container than the site's default width.

definition.label: Background gradient
definition.info: Background gradient replaces background where possible.

settings.label: Show on minicart and cart page
Free shipping rates
settings.info: Make sure that you have properly configured your shipping rates.

settings.label: Product Gift wrap
settings.info: Gift wrap needs to be set up as a product.

settings.label: Use Stock notification form
settings.info: If you use the stock notification form, when a product is out of stock, this function will appear and when the user registers, an email notification will be sent to your email store. To view or change your email store from your Shopify admin, click Settings, then click Store details.

settings.label: Show product action on mobile
settings.info: Show actions like: add cart, wishlist on mobile

settings.label: Description
settings.info: * [percent_sale] is the variable name that will be automatically replaced, you must not change it. But you can change it position in the text

settings.label: Enable catalog mode
settings.info: You can hide "Add to cart" buttons.

settings.label: List user purchased
settings.default: Jonson (California) | Tony (Texas) | Bruno (New York) | Eren (Ohio) | Lauren (Washington) | Flortino (California) | Blue (Ohio)

settings.label: Promotion content
settings.default: Up to 50% Off when using code [promotion_code]
settings.info: [promotion_code] is the variable name that will be automatically replaced, you must not change it. But you can change it position in the text

settings.label: Description
settings.default: Enter the code below at checkout to get 20% off your first order. [discount_code]
settings.info: * [discount_code] is the variable name that will be automatically replaced, you must not change it. But you can change it position in the text

settings.label: Enable page cart and mini cart
Text
settings.default: I agree with Terms & Conditions

settings.label: Message
settings.default: We use cookies to enhance your browsing experience, serve personalized ads or content, and analyze our traffic. By clicking 'Allow cookies', you consent to our use of cookies.

settings.info: Upload image: png, jpg or gif file (90 x 20px recommended)
